ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: A Saudi digital bank, fully Sharia-compliant and dedicated to delivering the best banking experience for everyone in Saudi Arabia.
ourStory.paragraph2: It's not just about banking services, we're redefining what banking means. A bank that's close to you, adapts to your needs, designed for you, and always one step ahead. We're committed to innovation while adhering to Islamic Sharia. We are leading the next era of banking: smarter, faster, and always one step ahead.
ourStory.paragraph3: We believe banking should be easy, straightforward, and grounded in trust and transparency.

taha.name: Taha Al-Quweiz
taha.title: Chairman
taha.description: Taha is the Chairman of the Board at D360 Bank and plays a pivotal leadership role across financial sectors.

zaki.name: Zaki Alshowaier
zaki.title: Vice Chairman
zaki.description: Zaki contributes extensive experience from leadership roles across multiple institutions.

ibrahim.description: Ibrahim brings a wealth of governance expertise and financial insight to the board.

bassem.name: Bassem Al Sallom
bassem.title: Board Member
bassem.description: Bassem leads strategic growth with a strong background in investment and capital markets.

fahad.name: Fahad AlJomaih
fahad.title: Board Member
fahad.description: Fahad supports D360 with his leadership in business development and financial transformation.

nouf.title: Board Member
nouf.description: Nouf drives innovation and inclusion, and is a champion of customer-centric banking.

tim.title: Board Member
tim.description: Tim brings global experience in banking operations, digital transformation, and customer engagement.

mudassir.name: Mudassir Sheikha
mudassir.title: Board Member
mudassir.description: Mudassir is known for building successful digital-first ventures and scaling innovation.

faraz.name: Faraz Khalid
faraz.title: Board Member
faraz.description: Faraz brings digital retail and e-commerce expertise to the strategic direction of D360.

licensed.question: Is D360 Bank a licensed bank in Saudi Arabia?
licensed.answer: Yes, D360 Bank is licensed by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA) and operates under all applicable regulations.

openAccount.question: How do I open an account with D360 Bank?
openAccount.answer: You can open an account easily through our mobile app. Download the app, follow the registration process, and verify your identity using Absher.

shariah.question: Is D360 Bank compliant with Islamic Shariah principles?
shariah.answer: Yes, all our products and services are fully compliant with Islamic Shariah principles and are approved by our Shariah Committee.

benefits.question: How can I benefit from the bank's services?
benefits.answer: Our services include digital banking, international transfers, investment opportunities, and more - all accessible through our user-friendly mobile app.

contact.title: Helping you wherever you are
contact.subtitle: Your opinion matters because you are at the heart of everything we do. Have a question, feedback, or even a complaint? Our team is here for you.
contact.appDescription: Reach out through the Help section. Send us a message or request a callback, and we'll be there for you.
